As long as these two conditions are met:  Remember your PIN Password  Photos backup wasnt deleted by other apps then  Reinstall CQuanCleaner  Easily recover or delete your Photos with just one-click  Build your own Private Space, defend your Private Life absolutely Note: Dont forget your PIN password, it may not be a fun prank.
